short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Shofy Radar offers free tools for Shopify sellers, enabling product export/import, store analysis, and theme detection.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The Shofy Radar Chrome Extension is your go-to tool for supercharging your Shopify store research and management. Designed specifically for Shopify sellers and enthusiasts, this extension seamlessly integrates with your browsing experience to deliver powerful insights and functionalities.

Shofy Radar Tools

Shopify Product Exporter - Free tool which can export products and collections of any Shopify store. This tool help sellers to quickly get product list from Shopify and maintain own listings, import to another Shopify, WooCommerce or Excel.

Shopify Store Analyzer - Free tool which can analyse and extract data of any Shopify store. This tool can extract product data, store data, sales, statistics and performance related data. This tool help sellers to quickly get an overview of any Shopify Store.

Shopify Theme Detector - Free tool which helps you instantly identify the theme used by any Shopify store. Just enter the store URL and click "Find Theme" to quickly analyze the store and extract theme information.

Features

- Shopify Website Detection: Instantly identifies if the webpage you’re visiting is a Shopify-powered store.
- Quick Access to Tools: Provides direct links to use Shofy Radar’s tools like Product Export, Store Analytics, and Theme Detection.
- Effortless Shopify Insights: Simplifies research by enabling one-click analysis of Shopify stores without leaving your browser.

How to Use

1. Install the Extension: Add the Shofy Radar extension to your Chrome browser from the Chrome Web Store.
2. Activate the Extension: Navigate to any webpage. Click on the extension icon from toolbar to detect if it’s a Shopify website.
3. Access Tools: If the site is Shopify-powered, quick links to access Shofy Radar tools.

Why Choose Shopify Radar?

- Streamline Shopify Research: All essential tools at your fingertips, saving you time and effort.
- Accurate Shopify Identification: No guesswork—know instantly if the site is a Shopify store.
- Boost Your E-Commerce Strategy: Gain actionable insights to optimize your Shopify selling experience.

Empower your Shopify journey with the Shopify Radar Chrome Extension—the ultimate companion for Shopify sellers and researchers.
